candidates.title: Bump smallvec to 1.0, release new minor version (0.27.2)
Add support for attributes on match arms in match_ignore_ascii_case!
Fix using the `match_ignore_ascii_case` macro inside another macro expansion
Unconditionally use MaybeUninit
candidates.body: This raises the minimum Rust version to 1.36.0, so this is a breaking change.

candidates.title: Update syn related dependencies to 1.0 and bump version
candidates.body: This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/servo/rust-cssparser/257)

candidates.title: Switch from rustc-serialize to serde_json
candidates.body: Fixes #253 --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/servo/rust-cssparser/255)

candidates.title: Use MaybeUninit when available
candidates.body: Fix deprecation warnings for `mem::uninitialized`. (They also affected other crates, since it’s used in a public macro.) --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/servo/rust-cssparser/252)

candidates.title: Numbers and percent delimiters need a comment separator.
candidates.body: See https://github.com/w3c/csswg-drafts/issues/4088. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/servo/rust-cssparser/251)

candidates.title: Expose byte index in tokenizer's position.
candidates.body: I need it to finish my implementation of Properties and Values syntax. It works on bytes rather than CSS tokens, but it calls the consume a name algorithm, for which I'm using cssparser. However I need to know how much of the input was actually consumed after consuming a name to continue the parse. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/servo/rust-cssparser/249)

candidates.title: Fix a "will be a hard error" warning + drive-by
candidates.body: See individual commits --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/servo/rust-cssparser/245)

candidates.title: Add Parser::try_parse, same as Parser::try
candidates.body: Fixes https://github.com/servo/rust-cssparser/issues/243 Note that we are not (so far) emitting deprecation warnings for the old name. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/servo/rust-cssparser/244)

candidates.title: color: Make cssparser::RGBA #[repr(C)].
candidates.body: This will be useful for my efforts of avoiding intermediate representations in the style system. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/servo/rust-cssparser/241)

candidates.title: Add Parser::new_error_for_next_token
candidates.body: This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/servo/rust-cssparser/235)

candidates.title: Bump cssparser-macros version
candidates.body: forgot to do when I bumped syn --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/servo/rust-cssparser/232)

candidates.title: tokenizer: Look for both env() and var() functions.
candidates.body: Differential Revision: https://phabricator.services.mozilla.com/D9609 --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/servo/rust-cssparser/230)

candidates.title: Update syn and bump version
candidates.body: This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/servo/rust-cssparser/229)

candidates.title: unicode_range: Make UnicodeRange repr(C).
candidates.body: I want to expose it to Gecko via cbindgen without copies to extinguish nsCSSValue. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/servo/rust-cssparser/228)

candidates.title: deps: bump encoding_rs to 0.8
candidates.body: This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/servo/rust-cssparser/227)

chosen_pr.title: Bump smallvec to 1.0, release new minor version (0.27.2)
